name: Irchy
description: Irchy is a multi-language project/product manager that will provide a hub for individual developers or small teams to create and manage their project/products. Project, in definition is a set of inputs and outputs required to achieve a goal but project in Irchy can possibly mean anything from an idea to a currently functional goal or product that a user wants to maintain. Irchy will provide great tools to ease the steps to maintain a project which are team communication through live messaging, weekly notifications, project overview, scrum wall or product task wall, project documents and team management settings.

name: Education for Revitalization
description: A non-profit web and android application that allow users to solve a range of subjects to earn revenue from ads and donate to a selected charity of choice.
